lyrics_abstract:
When you're feeling sad and low,
We will take you where you gotta go.
Smiling, dancing, everything is free.
All you need is positivity.

Colors of the world,
Spice up your life!
Every boy and every girl,
Spice up your life!
People of the world,
Spice up your life!
